name: Small Mercies
description: Suspiria--the Caretaker's one-time mate--has appeared, and wants to help! The aid of a Nacene would be invaluable during this crisis. Can you direct Suspiria's efforts to those who need help most?
rules:
-- Unique Maquis, Bajoran, and Ferengi Alliance Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using L. Paris, Kes, Janeway, Warp Theorists, Caregivers, or Suspiria will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: L. Paris, Kes, Janeway, Warp Theorists, Caregivers or Suspiria
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

screens.text: "We've been in search of powerful beings who could single-handedly change our response to this crisis. Suspiria is one such being. A Nacene, and one of the original caretakers of the Ocampa."
"I am still their caretaker, now more than ever. And, I suppose, yours. I wish to help, to make up for our... last meeting."
"Yes, where you tried to kill my entire crew, I haven't forgotten. My fellow captain will be helping to guide your efforts, to ensure your intentions are sincere."
"You taught me the meaning of mercy. You poor creatures deserve it, helpless as you are. So please, tell me where I can help."
"We've been in search of powerful beings who could single-handedly change our response to this crisis. Suspiria is one such being. A Nacene, and one of the original caretakers of the Ocampa."
"I am still their caretaker, now more than ever. And, I suppose, yours. I wish to help, to make up for our... last meeting."
"Yes, where you tried to kill my entire crew, I haven't forgotten. My fellow captain will be helping to guide your efforts, to ensure your intentions are sincere."
"You taught me the meaning of mercy. You poor creatures deserve it, helpless as you are. So please, tell me where I can help."
